ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: They have never actually deleted anyones account. ... From: Whitmore, Lance To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 9:44 AM Subject: RE:
ygData.messageBody:
They have never actually deleted anyones account.
----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 9:44 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Quick question

They are kept on the server for 3 months, then deleted there after.  Gives
you time to change your mind.  That's at least how the policy stood when I
was a guide, may have changed since.


-----Original Message-----
From: nara MKs [mailto:masterkiis_nara@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 12:35 PM
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Quick question

If one deactivates their account are the characters
there lost forever or can you come back and find
"everyone" there with all their equipment and such?

BF is playing AO and it gets expensive trying to
maintain more than one game at a time :-)

Amaiya
